section.title: The distribution
section.para: Unzip the Errai download (Errai-1.X.zip) to some location on your hard drive. You'll see following subdirectories:

itemizedlist.listitem: doc: User guide, javadocs and developers guide
examples: Examples that are used in the user guide
install: Installation scripts for several environments

section.title: Required software
section.para: Errai requires a JDK (standard java) version 5 or higher.
To execute the ant scripts, you'll need apache ant version 1.7.0 or higher:
